class.name: TokenBalanceQuery
class.brief_description: A query builder for token balances.
class.description: The TokenBalanceQuery class allows constructing queries for fetching token balances from the Torii indexer, supporting filtering by account addresses, contract addresses, and token IDs.

method.name: account_addresses
method.description: Sets the account addresses to filter by.

method.name: contract_addresses
method.description: Sets the contract addresses to filter by.

method.name: token_ids
method.description: Sets the token IDs to filter by.
